duties_responsibilities.duty: Create User Stories and translate them into clear and comprehensive user stories for effective testing.
Collaborate with development teams to ensure the testing process is well-integrated into the software development life cycle.
Participate in User Acceptance Testing to gain first-hand experience of end-users' perspectives and validate software functionality against business requirements.
Perform thorough testing of software applications, including functional, regression, and performance testing, to identify defects and ensure high-quality deliverables.
Contribute to the testing of automated processes and workflows by possessing a foundational understanding of RPA concepts and tools.
Contribute to the development of efficient and effective testing strategies through strong process design principles.
Efficiently manage multiple testing tasks, prioritize workloads, and provide regular status updates to relevant stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience)
